_header: Man is like the snow melting
Subjects: transitoriness, of life; growth and maturation
_description: What man is like — three rhyming lines

UnivLon657.Transcription:
Man is liche þe snow meltandeMan is liche þe rose
                    spredandeMan is liche þe apyl waxande
UnivLon657.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild. 
             A Register of Middle English Religious & Didactic Verse.
         2 vols. London: Oxford University Press for the Bibliographical
            Society: 1916-20: 1.470.
